title: Template at tenant scope
description: An Azure deployment template at tenant scope

metadata.description: Additional unstructured metadata to include with the template deployment.

apiProfile.description: The apiProfile to use for all resources in the template.

contentVersion.description: A 4 number format for the version number of this template file. For example, 1.0.0.0

resources.description: Collection of resources to be deployed

apiVersion.description: API Version of the resource type, optional when apiProfile is used on the template

dependsOn.description: Collection of resources this resource depends on

tags.description: Name-value pairs to add to the resource

scope.description: Scope property to be used to provide scope for a resource or to be used to specify a scope for Management Group or Tenant level deployments.

defaultValue.description: Default value to be used if one is not provided

allowedValues.description: Value can only be one of these values

metadata.description: Metadata for the parameter, can be any valid JSON object

minValue.description: Minimum value for the int type parameter

maxValue.description: Maximum value for the int type parameter

minLength.description: Minimum length for the string or array type parameter

maxLength.description: Maximum length for the string or array type parameter
